mapper.select: SELECT blc.id, blc.bmi_min, blc.bmi_max, blc.health_leve, blc.health_leve_name, blc.show_color FROM bmi_leve_config blc WHERE blc.bmi_min <= ${bmi} AND blc.bmi_max >= ${bmi} ORDER BY blc.id DESC
